    • Method Detail

      • addInHouse

        public void addInHouse()
        Create new In-House Part Object Run-Time Error: While testing, a run-time error occurred due to a "NumberFormatException". This error occurred when a String was inputted as the Part ID. Additional checks were added to the addPartFormSaveButtonSelected method (see line 163 and 188). These checks were added to see if the input value is a Number. If the input value is not a Number, an alert will popup to notify the user that the data entered is invalid. Next version of Inventory System application: In the current version of application, the Parts Inventory reflects the number of all parts on hand. However, it does not provide the user with the number of Parts that have been used and are associated with a Product. In the next version of the Inventory System, users will be able to keep track of the Parts inventory when it is being added or removed to/from a Product.
